title: Best Motorola Moto Razr (2025) wireless chargers
description: Charge your Motorola Moto Razr (2025) wirelessly with these best wireless charger. The post Best Motorola Moto Razr (2025) wireless chargers appeared first on Phandroid.
author: Ajit Singh
excerpt: Charge your Motorola Moto Razr (2025) wirelessly with these best wireless charger.
text: Motorola has unveiled the Moto Razr (2025) as its newest flip Android smartphone. It sports a 6.9-inch Full HD+ LTPO AMOLED primary display with a 120Hz refresh rate. The phone has a 3.6-inch external AMOLED display with a 90Hz refresh rate. Under the hood, it has the MediaTek Dimensity 7400X processor paired with 8GB of RAM. The phone is powered by a 4,500mAh battery. Since it is a flagship smartphone, you get wired fast charging and wireless charging support. The latter helps you with charging the phone without messing with charging cables. Here are the best Motorola Moto Razr (2025) wireless chargers. Best Motorola Moto Razr (2025) cases Motorola TurboPower 15W Wireless Charger It is the official Motorola wireless charger with 15W charging speed. The smartphone can be used in both landscape and portrait viewing angles. Its thermal dissipation system helps in keeping the temperature under control without requiring a fan. Spigen ArcField 15W Wireless Charger This is Spigen's wireless charger with a peak charging speed of 15W. It has a non-slip design due to rubber coating. It has an LED indicator and OverheatProtection technology. Compatible with cases up to 6mm thickness and is bundled with a USB-C to USB-C cable. Sale INIU 15W Wireless Charger This is a wireless charging stand with up to 15W charging speed. It has an auto-adaptive LED indicator that adjusts based on daytime or night time. Supports both landscape and portrait mode. Ability to control device temperature in real-time. Anker PowerWave II 15W Wireless Charging Pad This is Anker's wireless charger with peak charging speed of up to 15W. It is compatible with cases with up to 5mm thickness. Anti-slip rings ensure the phone stays in position and does not fall down during an incoming call. It comes bundled with a power cord. Anker PowerWave II 15W Wireless Charging Stand It is the same as the aforementioned wireless charger but comes in a different form factor. It is designed like a charging stand where the phone can be charged in both landscape and portrait orientation. All other features and specifications are unchanged. Sale Samsung 15W Wireless Charger Duo This is Samsung's wireless charger that can charge two devices at the same time. It can charge a phone and smartwatch or earbuds together. Its highest charging speed at 15W and has an in-built cooling fan. There is an LED indicator light to reflect the status of charging. Samsung 15W Wireless Charger This Samsung wireless charger is same as the Duo variant but can charge only one device at a time. It has all other features unchanged and same as the Duo version. Amazon Basics 15W Wireless Charging Pad This is Amazon's wireless charging pad and has peak charging speed up to 15W. It is case friendly and compatible with case thicknesses up to 5mm. It has a sleep-friendly LED indicator and comes with a USB-A to USB-C cable. Note: this article may contain affiliate links that help support our authors and keep the Phandroid servers running. Ajit is a freelance tech reporter who loves everything tech but has a soft corner for Android. He started his stint in tech journalism in 2015 and has previously worked with publications like Digit India and Android Headlines. You can also find his work on MySmartPrice. html:
Motorola has unveiled the Moto Razr (2025) as its newest flip Android smartphone. It sports a 6.9-inch Full HD+ LTPO AMOLED primary display with a 120Hz refresh rate. The phone has a 3.6-inch external AMOLED display with a 90Hz refresh rate.

Under the hood, it has the MediaTek Dimensity 7400X processor paired with 8GB of RAM. The phone is powered by a 4,500mAh battery. Since it is a flagship smartphone, you get wired fast charging and wireless charging support. The latter helps you with charging the phone without messing with charging cables. Here are the best Motorola Moto Razr (2025) wireless chargers.

  • Best Motorola Moto Razr (2025) cases

Motorola TurboPower 15W Wireless Charger

It is the official Motorola wireless charger with 15W charging speed. The smartphone can be used in both landscape and portrait viewing angles. Its thermal dissipation system helps in keeping the temperature under control without requiring a fan.

Spigen ArcField 15W Wireless Charger

This is Spigen's wireless charger with a peak charging speed of 15W. It has a non-slip design due to rubber coating. It has an LED indicator and OverheatProtection technology. Compatible with cases up to 6mm thickness and is bundled with a USB-C to USB-C cable.

Sale

INIU 15W Wireless Charger

This is a wireless charging stand with up to 15W charging speed. It has an auto-adaptive LED indicator that adjusts based on daytime or night time. Supports both landscape and portrait mode. Ability to control device temperature in real-time.

Anker PowerWave II 15W Wireless Charging Pad

This is Anker's wireless charger with peak charging speed of up to 15W. It is compatible with cases with up to 5mm thickness. Anti-slip rings ensure the phone stays in position and does not fall down during an incoming call. It comes bundled with a power cord.

Anker PowerWave II 15W Wireless Charging Stand

It is the same as the aforementioned wireless charger but comes in a different form factor. It is designed like a charging stand where the phone can be charged in both landscape and portrait orientation. All other features and specifications are unchanged.

Sale

Samsung 15W Wireless Charger Duo

This is Samsung's wireless charger that can charge two devices at the same time. It can charge a phone and smartwatch or earbuds together. Its highest charging speed at 15W and has an in-built cooling fan. There is an LED indicator light to reflect the status of charging.

Samsung 15W Wireless Charger

This Samsung wireless charger is same as the Duo variant but can charge only one device at a time. It has all other features unchanged and same as the Duo version.

Amazon Basics 15W Wireless Charging Pad

This is Amazon's wireless charging pad and has peak charging speed up to 15W. It is case friendly and compatible with case thicknesses up to 5mm. It has a sleep-friendly LED indicator and comes with a USB-A to USB-C cable.
